title: Discuss amongst yourselves
author: VD
content_html:
And Soup, as I noticed you’ve managed to restrain yourself elsewhere, please feel free to argue away with EP here on matters theological, at least until the column shows up in a few hours.

It’s a petty one and focuses on the most trivial aspect of a current event, but I felt it was something worth saying nevertheless.
